clearPuzzleConfirm: Так вы удалите все блоки, которые вы добавили или изменили, и начнёте головоломку сначала.
clearPuzzleConfirmHeader: Вы уверены, что хотите начать заново?
dropletBlock_andOperator_description: Возвращает значение истина если оба выражения истины, и значение ложь в противном случае
dropletBlock_arcLeft_description: Передвигает черепаху вперед и влево по слегка закругленной траектории
dropletBlock_arcLeft_param0_description: The angle along the circle to move.
dropletBlock_arcLeft_param1_description: The radius of the circle that is placed left of the turtle. Must be >= 0.
dropletBlock_arcRight_description: Передвигает черепаху вперед и вправо по слегка закругленной траектории
dropletBlock_arcRight_param0_description: The angle along the circle to move.
dropletBlock_arcRight_param1_description: The radius of the circle that is placed right of the turtle. Must be >= 0.
dropletBlock_assign_x_description: Присваивает значение существующей переменной. Например, x = 0;
dropletBlock_assign_x_param0_description: The variable name being assigned to
dropletBlock_assign_x_param1_description: The value the variable is being assigned to.
dropletBlock_button_description: Создает кликабельную кнопку. На кнопке будет отображаться введенный текст и ссылка на нее будет идти через заданный id
dropletBlock_button_param0_description: A unique identifier for the button. The id is used for referencing the created button. For example, to assign event handlers.
dropletBlock_button_param1_description: The text displayed within the button.
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_description: Вызывает указанную функцию, которая не принимает никаких параметров
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_descriptio: Вызывает указанную функцию, которая принимает один или несколько параметров
dropletBlock_checkbox_description: Создайте флажок и присвойте ему идентификатор элемента
dropletBlock_circle_description: Нарисуйте круг на холсте, указав координаты центра (x,y) и радиус
dropletBlock_circle_param0_description: The x position in pixels of the center of the circle.
dropletBlock_circle_param1_description: The y position in pixels of the center of the circle.
dropletBlock_circle_param2_description: The radius of the circle, in pixels.
dropletBlock_clearCanvas_description: Очистить все данные на активном холсте
dropletBlock_clearInterval_description: Очистить существующий интервал таймера, указав значение, которое возвращает setInterval()
dropletBlock_clearInterval_param0_descri: The value returned by the setInterval function to clear.
dropletBlock_clearTimeout_description: Очистите существующее измерение времени возвращающееся из setTimeout ()
dropletBlock_clearTimeout_param0_descrip: The value returned by the setTimeout function to cancel.
dropletBlock_console.log_description: Отображает строку или переменную на дисплее консоля
dropletBlock_console.log_param0_descript: The message string to display in the console.
dropletBlock_container_description: Создайте разделение контейнера с указанным элементом идентификации (ID), и, по не обходимости, установите его внутренний HTML ( Язык Гипертекстовой Разметки )
dropletBlock_createCanvas_description: Создать холст с указанным идентификатором, и, если возможно, установить параметры ширины и высоты
dropletBlock_createCanvas_param0_descrip: The id of the new canvas element.
dropletBlock_createCanvas_param1_descrip: The horizontal width in pixels of the rectangle.
dropletBlock_createCanvas_param2_descrip: The vertical height in pixels of the rectangle.
dropletBlock_createRecord_description: Использование программы лабораторной таблицы сохранения данных, создает запись с уникальным идентификатором в имени данной таблицы, и вызывает функцию "обратный вызов", когда действие завершено.
dropletBlock_createRecord_param0_descrip: The name of the table the record should be added to. `tableName` gets created if it doesn't exist.
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_d: Задает переменную и присваивает ей множество значений с заданными изначальными параметрами
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_p: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
The initial values to the array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_description: Объявляет переменную с данным именем после " Var ", и присваивает его значение на правой части выражения
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_param0_desc: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_param1_desc: The initial value of the variable
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_desc: Объявляет, что код теперь будет использовать переменную и присваивает ей начальное значение, определенное пользователем
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_para: The name you will use in the program to reference the variable
The string the user will see in the pop up when asked to enter a value
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_sign: Запросить у пользователя значения и сохранить его
dropletBlock_deleteElement_param0_descri: The id of the element to delete.
dropletBlock_deleteRecord_description: Using App Lab's table data storage, deletes the provided record in tableName. record is an object that must be uniquely identified with its id field. When the call is completed, the callbackFunction is called.
dropletBlock_deleteRecord_param0_descrip: The name of the table from which the records should be searched and read.
dropletBlock_deleteRecord_param2_descrip: A function that is asynchronously called when the call to deleteRecord() is finished.
dropletBlock_dot_description: Рисует точку с указанным радиусом на месте черепахи
dropletBlock_dot_param0_description: The radius of the dot to draw
dropletBlock_drawImage_description: Draws the specified image or canvas element onto the active canvas at the specified position, and optionally scales the element to the specified width and height
dropletBlock_drawImage_param0_descriptio: The x position in pixels of the upper left corner of the image to draw.
dropletBlock_drawImage_param1_descriptio: The x position in pixels of the upper left corner of the image to draw.
dropletBlock_drawImage_param2_descriptio: The y position in pixels of the upper left corner of the image to draw.
dropletBlock_dropdown_description: Create a dropdown, assign it an element id, and populate it with a list of items
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_descriptio: Test whether two values are equal. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression equals the value on the right-hand side of the expression, and false otherwise
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_param0_des: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_param1_des: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_forLoop_i_0_4_description: Creates a loop consisting of an initialization expression, a conditional expression, an incrementing expression, and a block of statements executed for each iteration of the loop
dropletBlock_functionParams_n_descriptio: A set of statements that takes in one or more parameters, and performs a task or calculate a value when the function is called
dropletBlock_functionParams_none_descrip: Набор утверждений, которые выполняют задачу или вычисления значения, когда функция вызвана
dropletBlock_getAlpha_description: Returns the amount of alpha (opacity) (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data
dropletBlock_getAlpha_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_getAlpha_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getAlpha_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getBlue_description: Gets the amount of blue (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data
dropletBlock_getBlue_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_getBlue_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getBlue_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getChecked_description: Get the state of a checkbox or radio button
dropletBlock_getDirection_description: Returns the current direction that the turtle is facing. 0 degrees is pointing up
dropletBlock_getGreen_description: Gets the amount of green (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data
dropletBlock_getGreen_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_getGreen_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getGreen_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getImageData_description: Returns an object representing the image data captured from the canvas in the coordinate range from startX, startY to endX, endY
dropletBlock_getImageData_param0_descrip: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image to start the capture.
dropletBlock_getImageData_param1_descrip: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image to start the capture.
dropletBlock_getImageData_param2_descrip: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image to end the capture.
dropletBlock_getImageData_param3_descrip: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image to end the capture.
dropletBlock_getImageURL_description: Get the URL for the provided image element id
dropletBlock_getImageURL_param0_descript: The id of the image element.
dropletBlock_getKeyValue_description: Retrieves the value stored at the provided key name in App Lab's key/value data storage. The value is returned as a parameter to callbackFunction when the retrieval is finished
dropletBlock_getKeyValue_param0_descript: The name of the key to be retrieved.
dropletBlock_getRed_description: Gets the amount of red (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data
dropletBlock_getRed_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_getRed_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getRed_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_getText_description: Get the text from the specified element
dropletBlock_getTime_description: Get the current time in milliseconds
dropletBlock_getUserId_description: Gets a unique identifier for the current user of this app
dropletBlock_getX_description: Gets the current x coordinate in pixels of the turtle
dropletBlock_getY_description: Gets the current y coordinate in pixels of the turtle
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_descrip: Tests whether a number is greater than another number. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is strictly greater than the value on the right-hand side of the expression
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_param0_: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_param1_: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_hideElement_description: Hides the element with the provided id so it is not shown on the screen
dropletBlock_hideElement_param0_descript: The id of the element to hide.
dropletBlock_hide_description: Hides the turtle so it is not shown on the screen
dropletBlock_ifBlock_description: Executes a block of statements if the specified condition is true
dropletBlock_ifElseBlock_description: Executes a block of statements if the specified condition is true; otherwise, the block of statements in the else clause are executed
dropletBlock_imageUploadButton_descripti: Create an image upload button and assign it an element id
dropletBlock_image_description: Displays the image from the provided url on the screen
dropletBlock_image_param0_description: The id of the image element.
dropletBlock_image_param1_description: The source URL of the image to be displayed on screen.
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_descript: Tests whether two values are not equal. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression does not equal the value on the right-hand side of the expression
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_param0_d: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_param1_d: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_innerHTML_description: Set the inner HTML for the element with the specified id
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_descriptio: Tests whether a value is less than another value. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is strictly less than the value on the right-hand side of the expression
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_param0_des: The first value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_param1_des: The second value to use for comparison.
dropletBlock_line_description: Draws a line on the active canvas from x1, y1 to x2, y2.
dropletBlock_line_param0_description: The x position in pixels of the beginning of the line.
dropletBlock_line_param1_description: The y position in pixels of the beginning of the line.
dropletBlock_line_param2_description: The x position in pixels of the end of the line.
dropletBlock_line_param3_description: The y position in pixels of the end of the line.
dropletBlock_mathMax_description: Возвращает максимальное значение среди одного или нескольких значений n1, n2, ..., nX
dropletBlock_mathMax_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathMin_description: Возвращает минимальное значение среди одного или нескольких значений n1, n2, ..., nX
dropletBlock_mathMin_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathRound_description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer
dropletBlock_moveBackward_description: Moves the turtle back a given number of pixels in its current direction
dropletBlock_moveBackward_param0_descrip: The number of pixels to move the turtle back in its current direction. If not provided, the turtle will move back 25 pixels
dropletBlock_moveForward_description: Moves the turtle forward a given number of pixels in its current direction
dropletBlock_moveForward_param0_descript: The number of pixels to move the turtle forward in its current direction. If not provided, the turtle will move forward 25 pixels
dropletBlock_moveTo_description: Moves the turtle to a specific x,y coordinate on the screen
dropletBlock_moveTo_param0_description: The x coordinate on the screen to move the turtle.
dropletBlock_moveTo_param1_description: The y coordinate on the screen to move the turtle.
dropletBlock_move_description: Moves the turtle from its current location. Adds x to the turtle's x position and y to the turtle's y position
dropletBlock_move_param0_description: The number of pixels to move the turtle right.
dropletBlock_move_param1_description: The number of pixels to move the turtle down.
dropletBlock_notOperator_description: Returns false if the expression can be converted to true; otherwise, returns true
dropletBlock_onEvent_description: Execute the callbackFunction code when a specific event type occurs for the specified element
dropletBlock_onEvent_param0_description: The ID of the UI control to which this function applies.
dropletBlock_onEvent_param1_description: The type of event to respond to.
dropletBlock_orOperator_description: Returns true when either expression is true and false otherwise
dropletBlock_penColor_description: Sets the color of the line drawn behind the turtle as it moves
dropletBlock_penColor_param0_description: The color of the line left behind the turtle as it moves
dropletBlock_penColour_description: Sets the color of the line drawn behind the turtle as it moves
dropletBlock_penDown_description: Causes a line to be drawn behind the turtle as it moves
dropletBlock_penUp_description: Stops the turtle from drawing a line behind it as it moves
dropletBlock_penWidth_description: Changes the diameter of the circles drawn behind the turtle as it moves
dropletBlock_penWidth_param0_description: The diameter of the circles drawn behind the turtle as it moves
dropletBlock_playSound_description: Play the MP3, OGG, or WAV sound file from the specified URL
dropletBlock_putImageData_description: Puts the input image data onto the current canvas element starting at position startX, startY
dropletBlock_putImageData_param0_descrip: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_putImageData_param1_descrip: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image to place the data on the canvas.
dropletBlock_putImageData_param2_descrip: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image to place the data on the canvas.
dropletBlock_radioButton_description: Creates a radio button and assigns it to a group for choosing from a predefined set of options. Only one radio button in a group can be selected at a time
dropletBlock_radioButton_param0_descript: A unique identifier for the radio button. The id is used for referencing the radioButton control. For example, to assign event handlers.
dropletBlock_radioButton_param1_descript: Whether the radio button is initially checked.
dropletBlock_radioButton_param2_descript: The group that the radio button is associated with. Only one button in a group can be checked at a time.
dropletBlock_randomNumber_max_descriptio: Returns a random number ranging from zero to max, including both zero and max in the range
dropletBlock_randomNumber_min_max_descri: Returns a random number ranging from the first number (min) to the second number (max), including both numbers in the range
dropletBlock_readRecords_description: Using App Lab's table data storage, reads the records from the provided tableName that match the searchTerms. When the call is completed, the callbackFunction is called and is passed the array of records.
dropletBlock_readRecords_param0_descript: The name of the table from which the records should be searched and read.
dropletBlock_rect_description: Draws a rectangle onto the active canvas positioned at upperLeftX and upperLeftY, and size width and height.
dropletBlock_rect_param0_description: The x position in pixels of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
dropletBlock_rect_param1_description: The y position in pixels of the upper left corner of the rectangle.
dropletBlock_rect_param2_description: The horizontal width in pixels of the rectangle.
dropletBlock_rect_param3_description: The vertical height in pixels of the rectangle.
dropletBlock_setActiveCanvas_description: Change the active canvas to the canvas with the specified id (other canvas commands only affect the active canvas)
dropletBlock_setActiveCanvas_param0_desc: The id of the canvas element to activate.
dropletBlock_setAlpha_description: Sets the amount of alpha (opacity) (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data
dropletBlock_setAlpha_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_setAlpha_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setAlpha_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setAlpha_param3_description: The amount of alpha (opacity) (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setBlue_description: Sets the amount of blue (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data to the blueValue input amount.
dropletBlock_setBlue_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_setBlue_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setBlue_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setBlue_param3_description: The amount of blue (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setChecked_description: Set the state of a checkbox or radio button
dropletBlock_setFillColor_description: Set the fill color for the active canvas
dropletBlock_setFillColor_param0_descrip: The color name or hex value representing the color.
dropletBlock_setGreen_description: Sets the amount of green (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data to the greenValue input amount.
dropletBlock_setGreen_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_setGreen_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setGreen_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setGreen_param3_description: The amount of green (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setImageURL_description: Sets the URL for the provided image element id
dropletBlock_setImageURL_param0_descript: The id of the image element.
dropletBlock_setImageURL_param1_descript: TThe source URL of the image to be displayed on screen.
dropletBlock_setInterval_description: Execute the callback function code every time a certain number of milliseconds has elapsed, until canceled
dropletBlock_setInterval_param1_descript: The number of milliseconds between each execution of the function.
dropletBlock_setKeyValue_description: Stores a key/value pair in App Lab's key/value data storage, and calls the callbackFunction when the action is finished.
dropletBlock_setKeyValue_param0_descript: The name of the key to be stored.
dropletBlock_setKeyValue_param2_descript: A function that is asynchronously called when the call to setKeyValue is finished.
dropletBlock_setParent_description: Set an element to become a child of a parent element
dropletBlock_setPosition_description: Position an element with x, y, width, and height coordinates
dropletBlock_setRGB_description: Sets the RGB color values (ranging from 0 to 255) of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data to the input red, green, blue amounts
dropletBlock_setRGB_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_setRGB_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setRGB_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setRGB_param3_description: The amount of red (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setRGB_param4_description: The amount of green (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setRGB_param5_description: The amount of blue (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setRGB_param6_description: Optional. The amount of opacity (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel. Defaults to 255 (full opacity).
dropletBlock_setRed_description: Sets the amount of red (ranging from 0 to 255) in the color of the pixel located at the given x and y position in the given image data to the redValue input amount.
dropletBlock_setRed_param0_description: The image data object that describes data captured from a canvas element (use [getImageData()](/applab/docs/getImageData))
dropletBlock_setRed_param1_description: The x position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setRed_param2_description: The y position in pixels starting from the upper left corner of image.
dropletBlock_setRed_param3_description: The amount of red (from 0 to 255) to set in the pixel.
dropletBlock_setSpritePosition_descripti: Мгновенно перемещает персонажа в указанное место.
dropletBlock_setStrokeColor_description: Set the stroke color for the active canvas
dropletBlock_setStrokeColor_param0_descr: The color name or hex value representing the color.
dropletBlock_setStrokeWidth_description: Set the line width for the active canvas
dropletBlock_setStrokeWidth_param0_descr: The width in pixels with which to draw lines, circles, and rectangles.
dropletBlock_setStyle_description: Добавьте текст с CSS стилем к элементу
dropletBlock_setText_description: Set the text for the specified element
dropletBlock_setTimeout_description: Set a timer and execute code when that number of milliseconds has elapsed
dropletBlock_setTimeout_param1_descripti: The number of milliseconds to wait before executing the function.
dropletBlock_showElement_description: Shows the element with the provided id
dropletBlock_showElement_param0_descript: The id of the element to hide.
dropletBlock_show_description: Shows the turtle on the screen, by making it visible at its current location
dropletBlock_speed_description: Sets the speed for the entire app's execution (which includes the turtle's speed). Expects a number from 1 - 100.
dropletBlock_speed_param0_description: The speed of the app's execution in the range of (1-100)
dropletBlock_startWebRequest_description: Request data from the internet and execute code when the request is complete
dropletBlock_startWebRequest_param0_desc: The web address of a service that returns data.
dropletBlock_textInput_description: Create a text input and assign it an element id
dropletBlock_textLabel_description: Creates and displays a text label. The text label is used to display a description for the following input controls: radio buttons, check boxes, text inputs, and dropdown lists
dropletBlock_textLabel_param0_descriptio: A unique identifier for the label control. The id is used for referencing the created label. For example, to assign event handlers.
dropletBlock_textLabel_param1_descriptio: The value to display for the label.
dropletBlock_textLabel_param2_descriptio: The id to associate the label with. Clicking the label is the same as clicking on the control.
dropletBlock_turnLeft_description: Changes the turtle's direction to the left by the specified angle in degrees
dropletBlock_turnRight_description: Changes the turtle's direction to the right by the specified angle in degrees
dropletBlock_turnTo_description: Changes the turtle's direction to a specific angle. 0 is up, 90 is right, 180 is down, and 270 is left
dropletBlock_turnTo_param0_description: The new angle to set the turtle's direction to.
dropletBlock_updateRecord_description: Using App Lab's table data storage, updates the provided record in tableName. record must be uniquely identified with its id field. When the call is completed, the callbackFunction is called
dropletBlock_updateRecord_param0_descrip: The name of the table from which the records should be searched and read.
dropletBlock_whileBlock_description: Creates a loop consisting of a conditional expression and a block of statements executed for each iteration of the loop. The loop continues to execute as long as the condition evaluates to true
dropletBlock_write_description: Appends the specified text to the bottom of the document. The text can also be formatted as HTML.
dropletBlock_write_param0_description: The text or HTML you want appended to the bottom of your application
emptyBlocksErrorMsg: Блокам "повторять" или "если" необходимо иметь внутри другие блоки для работы. Убедись  в том, что внутренний блок должным образом подходит к блоку, в котором он содержится.
emptyFunctionBlocksErrorMsg: Блок процедуры требует для работы другие блоки внутри себя.
emptyFunctionalBlock: У вас есть блок с незаполненными входными данными.
errorEmptyFunctionBlockModal: В определении вашей функции обязательно должны быть блоки. Нажмите "Редактировать" и поместите блоки внутри зеленого блока.
errorIncompleteBlockInFunction: Нажмите "Редактировать" чтобы убедиться, что вы не пропустили никаких блоков в определении функции.
errorParamInputUnattached: Не забудьте прикрепить блок к каждому входящему параметру блока функции в своем рабочем пространстве.
errorRequiredParamsMissing: Создайте параметр для своей функции нажав "Редактировать" и добавив необходимые параметры. Перетащите новые блоки параметров в определение своей функции.
errorUnusedFunction: Вы создали функцию, но не использовали её в работе! Нажмите на «Функции» на панели инструментов и убедитесь, что вы используете её в своей программе.
errorUnusedParam: Вы добавили блок параметров, но не использовали его в определении функции. Чтобы убедиться, что вы используете ваш параметр, нажмите "Редактировать" и поместите блок параметра внутри зеленого блока.
extraTopBlocksWhenRun: У вас остались неприсоединённые блоки. Вы собирались присоединить их к блоку "При запуске"?
finalStageTrophies: Поздравляю! Ты завершил последний этап и выиграл {numTrophies, plural, one {кубок} other {# кубков}}.
generatedCodeInfo: Даже в лучших университетах изучают блочное программирование (например, {berkeleyLink}, {harvardLink}). Но на самом деле блоки, которые вы собирали, могут быть отображены на JavaScript, наиболее широко используемом в мире языке программирования:
genericFeedback: Посмотрите, что у вас получилось, и попытайтесь исправить вашу программу.
hashError: К сожалению, «%1» не соответствует какой-либо сохранённой программе.
levelIncompleteError: Ты используешь все необходимые виды блоков, но неправильным способом.
missingBlocksErrorMsg: Для решения этой головоломки попробуй один или несколько из следующих блоков:
nextLevelTrophies: Поздравляю! Ты завершил головоломку {puzzleNumber} и выиграл {numTrophies, plural, one {кубок} other {# кубков}}.
nextStageTrophies: Поздравляем! Вы выполнили {stageName} и выиграли {numTrophies, plural, one {a trophy} other {# trophies}}.
numBlocksNeeded: Поздравляю! Ты завершил головоломку {puzzleNumber}. (Однако, можно было обойтись всего  {numBlocks, plural, one {1 блоком} other {# блоками}}.)
numLinesOfCodeWritten: Ты только что написал {numLines, plural, one  {1 строку} other {# строки}} кода!
orientationLock: Выключите блокировку ориентации в настройках устройства.
runTooltip: Запускает программу, заданную блоками в рабочей области.
shareFailure: К сожалению, мы не можем поделиться этой программой.
subtitle: среда визуального программирования
toggleBlocksErrorMsg: Вам необходимо исправить ошибку в вашей программе, прежде чем она будет отображена в виде блоков.
tooFewBlocksMsg: Ты используешь все необходимые виды блоков, но попробуй использовать большее число  блоков, чтобы завершить головоломку.
tooManyBlocksMsg: Эта головоломка может быть решена блоками <x id='START_SPAN'/><x id='END_SPAN'/>.
tooMuchWork: Ты заставил меня попотеть! Может, будешь стараться делать меньше попыток?
totalNumLinesOfCodeWritten: Общее количество: {numLines, plural, one {1 строка} other {# строки}} кода.
